contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Nihongo|'''Yamoto Station'''|矢本駅|Yamoto-eki}} is a [[East Japan Railway Company|JR East]] [[train station|railway station]] located in [[Higashimatsushima, Miyagi|Higashi-Matsushima]], [[Miyagi Prefecture|Miyagi]], [[Japan]]. ==Line== *[[East Japan Railway Company|JR East]] **[[Senseki Line]] ==Surrounding area== {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} ==History== *November 22, 1928: Station begins operation. ==Adjacent stations== {{Senseki Line}} {{coord|38.4210|N|141.2099|E|type:railwaystation_region:JP|display=title}} [[Category:Railway stations in Miyagi Prefecture]] [[Category:Senseki Line]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1928]] {{Miyagi-railstation-stub}}
